response:
<<<api>>>: File.mkdirs
<<<code>>>: File myDir=new File("/sdcard/Download");
try{
myDir.mkdirs();
String fname = "Image.jpg";
File file = new File (myDir,fname);} catch {System.out.println("Something went wrong.");}
